Volunteers

The Joomla! project is 100%  run by dedicated, passionate volunteers.

MEET THEM

Joomla!

  • Joomla! currently powers over 3% of the entire internet and around 7% of all content managed websites. Websites ranging from small blogs to large Fortune 500 companies worldwide use Joomla!.
  • Recently Joomla! passed the 90 million download mark. In the world of open source content management systems Joomla! stands out from the rest.

    Visit www.joomla.org
